attributes.action: Require airlines cancel flights to places the FCO has advised against travel to
attributes.additional_details: Travel insurance will not normally cover travel if the FCO advise against travel to a particular destination, but airlines still operate flights which means many people either have to travel uninsured or cancel their trip and lose the money that has been spent on flights.
attributes.background: We want the Government to require to airlines cancel flights to locations the FCO has advised against all but essential travel to, so that customers can get a refund.
